wordpressPost.title: 2004-2008 Teaching in French Guiana
wordpressPost.content:
Joined a middle School in the West of French Guiana (Amazonian forest)

  • Teaching using the internet and numeric tools in an Amazonian tribal context (Bushinenge – Hmong).
